name: OYS/ 4
description:
Over Your Shoulder (I was looking for the truth)
-----
/Stranger, a woman in her 50s I accidentally saw once in Natanz historical mosque/
/The mosque is very old yet it’s pretty forgotten among Iran’s touristic sights and have only few visitors. It was the first time I saw a tourist in it, she was bright and had a stranger’s light/
/She looked at the details like she cared for them. I remember the lonely mosque was happy about this visitor/
-----
35mm photography from OYS series/ I often walk slow, I like to wait and watch people from behind. A photo from someone’s back is a proof of his/her existence in that time and place. It says nothing more, it shows very few details about that person. Only that they are humans. In OYS, I explore stories of people you don’t see their faces in between notes.
